author: hatakeyamak
body:
#### PR description:

Remove PFHBHERecHitCreatorMaxSample-related file and some other unused PFClusterProducer config files. Addressing comments on:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/17529

#### PR validation:

Made sure a few representative matrix tests run without a problem.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

This is not a backport.

@bendavid @jpata
title: Cleanup PFHBHERecHitCreatorMaxSample etc
